wiki.content: "Never Gonna Leave This Bed" is a track by Maroon 5 from their third studio album Hands All Over. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Never Gonna Leave This Bed" is a track by Maroon 5 from their third studio album Hands All Over.
